Warez-Host.Com ♥ Offshore Semi Dedicated Hosting cPanel ♥ Online Support ♥ 25% OFF

Hi All

Warez-Host was founded in 2007 and offering quality, reliable and affordable offshore hosting services.
We have a rock solid infrastructure in place and guaranteed to serve you the next several years to come.

We are among the most reliable and trusted hosting services for personal and business use. We will make sure that your site gets loaded lightning fast and applications run far better as compared to any other hosting environment. We also offer you a 7 day money back guarantee in case you are not satisfied with our services.

Warez-Host Semi-Dedicated Linux Server is a Dedicated Server which is shared only between few clients. With our semi-dedicated server web hosting plan you enjoy all the same benefits of a dedicated server, you have access to a large portion of the server resources, allowing you to run more traffic and resource intensive websites as well as more complex scripts and softwares without CPU latency becoming an issue.

Warez-Host offers an array of Semi Dedicated Hosting plans designed for every budget.


Semi-Dedicated Hosting Features:
* Dual Processor Xeon E5-2440 v2 Servers, 48GB RAM DDR3
* Dual Processor Xeon E5-2620 v2 Servers, 64GB RAM DDR3
* Solid State Disk (SSD Servers)
* Over 9 Years of Experience in the Hosting Industry
* 24x7x365 Premium Support
* Live Chat Support
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* 1Gbps Uplink Port
* cPanel and WHM Control Panel
* Online Webmail and FTP (includes Roundcube, Horde, SquirrelMail)
* PHP, CGI, Perl, JavaScript, MySQL Support, CURL, ImageMagick, GD, IonCube, Zend Optimizer and more!
* Multiple Domains in one account
* Less Clients per Server
* Softaculous Auto Installer
* cPnginx
* Daily Backups
* Weekly Backups
* Competitive pricing
* 24x7 Monitoring
* So much more...


Network & Facilities:
* Fast, Secure and Stable Network
* High Performance Servers inside Our Private Colocation of Europe
* Choice of Network Location: Netherlands / Bulgaria / Sweden / Russia


Get 20% Lifetime Discount All Warez-Host Semi-Dedicated Hosting Accounts! USE COUPON CODE "XmaS20SD" TO RECEIVE 20% DISCOUNT LIFETIME
